title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
description: The MRU (Most Recently Used) File List is not being saved between sessions.
OB: The MRU file list in the File menu is empty after restarting the application.
EB: The MRU file list should retain the recently used files between sessions. When you reopen the application, the list should show the files you previously opened.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Start the workbench.
2. Open 2 or 3 files.
3. Shutdown the workbench.
4. Restart the workbench.
